description: This file is the main entry point for a React web application. It imports necessary React modules, styles, and app components, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root to render a React component tree into a DOM element.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A wrapper component that activates additional checks and warnings for its descendants.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders a React element into the root DOM node.
